name: Mid Centurey Swivel Rocker ReUpholstered in Mohair
description:
Papa Bear's chair, for sure! This well loved swivel rocker was stripped bare to its hard wood frame, new cushions of high density foam cut, fresh Dacron padding and EXQUISITE gray mohair fabric added to create what amounts to a brand new chair that will last another 50 years!

Mohair is the soft, velvety fabric often used in high traffic areas like symphony seats and train benches. Wool comes from sheep. Mohair comes from a goat. So if you are allergic or sensitive to wool, this is a perfect long wearing fiber for you.

The color is a deep, neutral charcoal gray that catches the light and just radiates, as seen by the photos. It is a very easy color to work with and hides a multitude of sins...like cheeto fingers.

Please contact me regarding shipping for this item. Shipping IS NOT INCLUDED and price will vary according to destination and delivery service chosen.

name: Mid Century ReUpholstered Bouoir Chair
description:
Cute boudoir chair reupholstered by Sit On It...a chair gallery. Perfect for placing in front of a vanity (as shown here) or a corner in a bedroom or closet...or just about anywhere in a perfectly groomed chick pad!

There are casters on the bottom of the hardwood frame for ease of rolling from place to place. The soft velvet fabric has a black and white diamond pattern that is reminiscent of Gabrielle Coco Chanel (that's why I nick-named her the "Gabrielle" chair). A little black pillow is all she needs to dress it up or down. Ask me about a custom design!

This little beauty started out a bit bedraggled. SOMEBODY had the audacity to PAINT the fabric from blue to pink...really? So what was once a great fabric, was stripped off, new foam and Dacron added and every diamond in the soft velvet matched up with precision.

Please convo me regarding shipping for this item. Shipping IS NOT INCLUDED and price will vary according to destination and delivery service chosen.

name: Ficks and Reed Vintage Rattan Lounge Chair
description:
The frame on this armless lounge chair is in great condition. Two springs have been replaced and the center support recovered. The cushion has been freshened with new fabric and cord, but the Marshall Unit interior cushion has been kept. After all, they are the very best...why mess with perfection?

One bamboo detail is missing, please see photo number 2. But I really don't find it detracting.

Please message me regarding shipping for this item. Shipping IS NOT INCLUDED and price will vary according to destination and delivery service chosen.

name: 1940's Vintage ReUpholstered Lounge Chair
description:
This lounge chair was rebuilt from the base up! Springs retied, cushion replaced with high density foam for a firm seat, all fresh Dacron and a really fabulous modern cotton velvet fabric. The wooden trim was black lacquered for a dramatic effect!

This is the kind of chair you just wont find anywhere...unless you look back through my other upholstery listings for the perfect compliment. The Mid Century 1950's lounge chair is finished with the same grid velvet fabric and these two chairs are shown together in my shop (and receive multiple compliments!) The fabric has been Scotch Guarded, but I recommend that you reapply every few months.

Please contact me regarding shipping for this item. Shipping IS NOT INCLUDED and price will vary according to destination and delivery service chosen.

name: Mid Century ReUpholstered Lounge Chair
description:
This 1950s lounge chair was rebuilt from the base up by Sit On It...a chair gallery! The wood trim was restored and brass trim polished. The yucky, original fabric was stripped, the cushions replaced with high density foam for firm seating, springs tightened, and Dacron replaced. The soft white, cotton velvet grid fabric was matched at the seams (I'm a bit obsessive about that detail). The fabric has been Scotch Guarded, but I recommend reapplying every few months.

Bringing fabulous, vintage frames into current lifestyle colors and fabrics is what I specialize in. My motto is to "Furnish Forward" by investing in pieces that will last another 50 years!

Please contact me regarding shipping for this item. Shipping IS NOT INCLUDED and price will vary according to destination and delivery service chosen.
